It also has a glass interior.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="540" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">See Burns Library staff for terms governing use.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="500" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Forms part of the Liturgy and Life Artifacts Collection.
